<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines trigger condition, activation and deactivation statements. Trigger condition has to return [[Boolean]]. [[true]] will activate the trigger, [[false]] will deactivate it (only if activation is set to repeat). [[thisList]] returns the same result as [[list]] command, which includes all entities in the trigger area that are capable of activating the trigger. Dead entities are excluded as well as crew in vehicles, vehicles themselves are included.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''setTriggerStatements''' [condition, activation, deactivation]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] - Trigger object
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [condition, activation, deactivation]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> condition: [[String]] - Code containing trigger condition. Special variables available here:
* [[Magic Variables#this_2|this]] ([[Boolean]]) - detection event
* [[thisTrigger]] ([[Object]]) - trigger instance
* [[thisList]] ([[Array]]) - array of all detected entities
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> activation: [[String]] - Code that is executed when the trigger is activated. Special variables available here:
* [[thisTrigger]] ([[Object]]) - trigger instance
* [[thisList]] ([[Array]]) - array of all detected entities
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> deactivation: [[String]] - Code that is executed when the trigger is deactivated. Special variable available here:
* [[thisTrigger]] ([[Object]]) - trigger instance

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_trg [[setTriggerStatements]] ["this", "[[hint]] 'trigger on'", "[[hint]] 'trigger off'"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[triggerStatements]], [[createTrigger]], [[setTriggerActivation]], [[setTriggerArea]], [[setTriggerText]], [[setTriggerTimeout]], [[setTriggerType]], [[Magic Variables#this_2|this]], [[thisList]], [[thisTrigger]], [[triggerInterval]], [[setTriggerInterval]], [[enableSimulation]], [[simulationEnabled]]
</value></part></template>
